Award Type: DIRECT PAYMENT FOR SPECIFIED USE, AS A SUBSIDY OR OTHER NON-REIMBURSABLE DIRECT FINANCIAL AID (C)
Description: PROVIDER RELIEF FUND - HHS AWARDED PROVIDER RELIEF FUNDS (PRF) FUNDS TO A SINGLE ENTITY, LOCATED IN UTAH, THAT IN TURN MADE DIRECT PRF PAYMENTS TO RECIPIENTS ACROSS THE COUNTRY. MORE DETAILED INFORMATION IS AVAILABLE ON THE HHS TAGGS SITE FOUND AT HTTPS://TAGGS.HHS.GOV/CORONAVIRUS. HHS WILL EXPLORE A LONGER-TERM SOLUTION FOR TRANSMITTING PRF PAYMENT RECIPIENT INFORMATION TO USASPENDING IN THE FUTURE.
